name: Football Try Outs
description:
Get your hands on Football Try Outs today, a football game where the player attempts to not get tackled while collecting health packs along the way.

- Collect up to 3 health packs to ensure you survive any tackles!
- Run routes around the other football jocks to survive!
- Weave in and out to survive for as long as possible
- Unlock luchadors, mounties, bikers, and much more in the shop!

Get in on the fun that everyone's playing. Download and try out Football Try Outs today!
